name: check_a_url
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool exerra_phishing_check.
Tool description: This API checks URLs to see whether they are known phishing attempts. 
API description: Check if the provided URL is a known phishing or scam attempt using the FraudFreeze API.

url.description:
This is the URL that the API will check.
Must be a valid HTTP(s) URL or it will throw a 400
